name: Santa's russian roulette with depressed elves
name_original: Santa's russian roulette with depressed elves
description:
So, huh, seems like you really were intrigued by the title. Fair enough.

Pretty much, it's suprisingly yet another console (text based) game I put together in a couple of minutes for an unofficial Christmas gamejam. At the beginning you can select how many elves you want to play the game of russian roulette (it can be up to however many your computer can handle) and then Santa's revolver will get passed around between them . . . wait, do I really even have to explain how russian roulette works?
